claim: the carnal sin remix by laurent boutonnat be more than 7:00
resp:
1. Identify the claim: The claim states that the "carnal sin remix by laurent boutonnat" has a length greater than 7 minutes (or 7*60 seconds).

2. Find the row containing the carnal sin remix in the table: Search for the version with the name "carnal sins remix". In this case, it is located at the 10th row (index 9) as it is the only row where the version column has the value "carnal sins remix".

3. Check the length of the carnal sin remix: Look for the length of the song in the row that was identified earlier. In this case, the length of the carnal sin remix can be found in the 4th cell of the 10th row (index 3 and 9), which is "7:00".

4. Convert the length to seconds: Since the time is given in minutes and seconds (for example, "7:00" means 7 minutes and 0 seconds), we only need to consider the number of minutes. In this case, the number of minutes is already 7, so no conversion is needed.

5. Compare the length with the claimed length: Since the actual length (7 minutes) is equal to the claimed length (greater than 7 minutes), it follows that the claim is TRUE.
